alert.note: Alert for Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:04PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Windham, northeastern Tolland, southwestern Norfolk, southeastern Worcester, southeastern Hampden and northern Providence Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 203 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southbridge, or 19 miles southwest of Worcester, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, Johnston, Smithfield, Lincoln, Killingly, Webster, Southbridge, Bellingham, Burrillville, Northbridge, Oxford, Uxbridge, Charlton, Stafford, North Smithfield, Dudley, Wrentham and Scituate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
